channel.description: Recent content in Overview on Security365 Docs

item.title: Get started
item.description: Get started with Cloudflare Page Shield ​​ Activate Page Shield To enable Page Shield: Log in to the Cloudflare dashboard External link icon Open external link , and select your account and domain. Go to Security > Page Shield. Click Enable Page Shield. ​​ Review detected scripts When you enable Page Shield, it may take a while to get the list of detected scripts in your domain. Review the scripts displayed in the Active scripts dashboard, checking them for signs of malicious activity.

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: Troubleshoot Cloudflare Page ShieldFor a list of frequently asked questions, refer to Troubleshooting Page Shield External link icon Open external link in the Support KB.
